title: Linux Server Monitoring
description: A pre-configured Linux monitoring solution using Docker.
note:
Application data MUST be set up BEFORE deploying this stack!

# Download appdata files
wget https://files.thedebugged.life/appdata/linux-monitoring.zip

# Unpack into local appdata folder
unzip -n linux-monitoring.zip -d /srv/appdata/

# Setup proper permissions
sudo chown -R 472:docker /srv/appdata/grafana
sudo chown -R 65534:docker /srv/appdata/prometheus

See the template README or the related blog post for more info.

env.name: SMARTCTL_INTERVAL
env.label: How often to poll devices for SMART status

env.name: PROMETHEUS_RETENTION_TIME
env.label: How long to store metrics data in Prometheus

env.name: PROMETHEUS_RETENTION_SIZE
env.label: Largest size to allow the TSDB file to grow before trimming

env.name: GRAFANA_WEB_PORT
env.label: Port on the host (server) that will be mapped to the Grafana website
